description:
Why should I do this course?

Learn how to both increase your reading abilities, as well as how to actually learn in the first place.

During our schooling years we are taught how to remember things for the short term and to regurgitate information for exams.


Who is this course intended for?

  1. People who want to increase their reading speed, comprehension and retention
  2. Students at university, college or high school.
  3. Anybody who has a lot of reading material to digest and struggling to get around to it
  4. People who want to learn how to take more effective notes
  5. People who want to learn a better way of learning


What am I going to get from this course?

  • Enhance your reading abilities by at least doubling your current reading speed.
  • Increase your comprehension of what you have read.
  • Increase your retention of your reading or studies
  • Learn how to learn more effectively
  • Become more confident as both a reader and learner.


How is this course delivered?

There are 38 lectures made up of:

  1. Around 2.4 hours of video
  2. 10 downloadable documents
  3. 1 Relaxation Technique Audio
  4. 15 Easy exercises to increase your reading speed
  5. Tips on how to enhance you reading, studying, note taking, brain activities and eye exercises.


What is required for me to do this course?

  1. You must be able to read at a high school level
  2. Open mind and a willingness to try new techniques
  3. A commitment to practice the techniques
title: Speed Reading and Learning
